title: Jill Ross
deck:
I am married to Tom and help lead prayer and marriage ministry in the church. We have two children and three grandchildren.

I am a Health Improvement Specialist with City of York Council and have a private Counselling Practice. l volunteer with two Christian charities in the city, as a trainer and supervisor with Reflect Pregnancy choices and loss service, and as a trustee for Family Matters where Tom and l are also part of the couples in crisis team. I love supporting couples and individuals to work through issues to become happier and healthier, and also reading and relaxing with friends and playing with my gorgeous grandchildren.
